page.title: 09My Holiday-Going To London
page.content: One morning we had to wake up at half past five to go to London. We went to Grimsby railway station. We got on the train. It took us about two and a half hours to get to London. First we went on a bus to the zoo. There were seals, lions, birds and all different kinds of animals. After we went there, we went to the waxworks. We went to St. Paul's Cathedral, but it was closed. I bought some gifts from London then we went back on the train. We got back home late at night. By Diana Frost, aged 8.
